messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: This election will be a straight fight between Labour and Cameron's Tories

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Scotland faces a big choice about economic recovery. I want to get us back on track, create new jobs, and protect services. The Tories would be bad for us in Scotland. They'd cut support to the economy immediately, risking another recession.
They say they'd cut tax credits and child trust funds, but give the very richest a massive tax break. That's not fair - and remember the SNP would let the Tories in by the back door.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember the SNP would let the Tories in by the back door.

issues.economy: Scotland faces a big choice about economic recovery. I want to get us back on track, create new jobs, and protect services. The Tories would be bad for us in Scotland. They'd cut support to the economy immediately, risking another recession.
issues.socialWelfare: They say they'd cut tax credits and child trust funds, but give the very richest a massive tax break.
